verbs.description: [ARG0: Pie - in - the - sky plan] [V: Regarding] [ARG1: “ Oklahoma 's proposed marijuana law would be groundbreaking] ” ( News , June 3 ) : Soon Oklahomans will get the chance to vote on another pie - in - the sky resolution to forever solve our shortage of funds caused by overspending and mismanagement to feed the monsters overseeing our state budget . I can not count the times we have heard the same sad story and gone to the polls supporting the farce for another tax increase . Please do n't fall for this travesty . Passage of this state question will probably cost much more to regulate and manage than it will bring in . If passed as written , anyone with a trumped - up need will be able to walk into a doctor 's office and get a prescription to support their habit of use .
